name: Štíteknabalík.cz
author: Foxdeli

sections.description:
Easy to use. Free to start!

Štíteknabalík.cz is the solution for generating shipping labels that helps Czech merchants speed up and automate the shipping of parcels, letters and pallets. Comprehensive shipping management solution for small and large e-shops.

Main benefits of the plugin

  • Shipping label printing for all carriers in the Czech Republic
  • Speed up shipping by 30 sec per package
  • Zero error rate during dispatch
  • Reduction of return shipping costs
  • Less manual work for warehouse staff
  • 14 days to try for FREE

Print labels and tags in one click

Print labels for all carriers from one system. Process bulk or individual orders with no hassle. Save up to 30 seconds of manual work per package, reduce shipping errors to a minimum.

Overview of all shipments

Automatically updated shipping status of all shipments and packages in one place. As soon as a package status changes, shipped, delivered or returned, the status changes instantly in the Foxdeli environment. Smooth and clear expedition is the foundation of a successful e-shop.

Time and cost saving data

Uncover the logistics chain and get data of return rates, average delivery time, number of CODs or the most popular or reliable carrier. Use the new data to make effective decisions that minimize returns and reduce shipping and logistics costs.

Technical support

Technical support is available every day between 9am-5pm. We gladly help you to set up the service and address all your individual needs. Download the module today and start shipping with Štíteknabalík.cz

Try Štíteknabalík.cz for 14 days absolutely FREE and without any obligations.

View supported carriers

Shipping

= Zásilkovna =
* Toret Zásilkovna
* WPify Woo Česko
Current integration supports CZ Pickup Points delivery and CZ Delivery to the address.

PPL

  • Toret PPL

GLS

  • Toret GLS

Czech Post

  • Toret Czech Post

Order status

  • WooCommerce Order Status Manager
  • Custom Order Status for Woocommerce

How to start using Štíteknabalík.cz plugin

  1. Register at Štíteknabalík.cz and complete the setup of your account
  2. Install and activate the Štíteknabalík.cz plugin into your WordPress administration
  3. Enter your API token in the WooCommerce settings in the Štíteknabalík.cz menu
  4. Complete the Štíteknabalík.cz plugin setup and that’s it
sections.changelog:
0.6.0.2

  • Update fix

0.6.0.1

  • Update fix

0.6.0

  • Rebranding to Štíteknabalík.cz
  • Configuration moved to admin menu

0.5.5.3

  • Fix: Failed 0.5.5.2 update

0.5.5.2

  • Fix: Toret ČP pickup place ID

0.5.5.1

  • Fix: Show collection place IDs in bridge mode settings

0.5.5

  • Feat: Added bridge mode – use Woocommerce as a bridge to Foxdeli. Find information in Woocommerce – Settings – Foxdeli.com – Bridge Mode

0.5.0

  • Feat: Toret Czech Post integration
  • Fix: Bulk exporting
  • Fix: Better error handling

0.4.1.2

  • Fix: Bulk closing and cancelling deliveries

0.4.1.1

  • Fix: Getting right value of package to API request

0.4.1

  • Fix: Foxdeli Log
  • Fix: Export with Toret Zásilkovna

0.4.0.1

  • Fix: Wrong weight sending to API

0.4

  • Feat: Monitored deliveries
